CalcServer.description: A calculator server with basic arithmetic operations, trigonometric functions, resource management, sampling capabilities, and prompt templates

add.description: Adds two numbers a and b together and returns the sum

ambiguous_add.description: Adds two numbers together but only accepts 'a' input and uses elicitation to request 'b' input from the user

cos.description: Calculates the cosine of an angle in radians (disabled by default)

sin.description: Calculates the sine of an angle in radians (disabled by default)

set_trig_allowed.description: Enables or disables trigonometric functions (cos and sin) per-client

write_special_number.description: Updates the special number resource with a new value

eval_with_sampling.description: Evaluates a string arithmetic expression using LLM sampling to parse and compute the result

resource://special-number.description: A mutable number resource that can be read and updated via tools

example-maths.description: A prompt template that helps with mathematical problem solving

FileServer.description: A server that provides file system access with resource templates and subscriptions

write_file.description: Writes content to a file at the specified path

delete_file.description: Deletes a file at the specified path

file:///{path}.description: Access any file by providing its path

path.description: The file path relative to the root directory

code_review.description: Analyzes code quality and suggests improvements

summarize_file.description: Summarizes the content of a file at the given path

ErrorServer.description: A server designed to test error handling and edge cases

always_error.description: Always returns a tool execution error

timeout.description: Takes a long time to execute, useful for testing timeouts

invalid_response.description: Returns a response that doesn't match its declared schema

error://not-found.description: A resource that always returns not found error

scenarios.description: client1 connects to CalcServer and calls add(a=10, b=20), gets result of 30
client1 connects to CalcServer and calls ambiguous_add(a=10), receives elicitation for b, responds with 20, gets result of 30
client1 & client2 connect to CalcServer; client1 calls set_trig_allowed(allowed=true); client1 gets list of tools that includes cos & sin, and client2 gets list of tools that doesn't
client1 connects to CalcServer, reads resource://special-number (gets 42), calls write_special_number(value=100), reads resource://special-number again (gets 100)
client1 connects to CalcServer, subscribes to resource://special-number, calls write_special_number(value=99), receives resource update notification
client1 connects to CalcServer, gets prompt 'example-maths' with arguments {problem: 'What is 5 factorial?'}, receives prompt messages
client1 connects to CalcServer, calls eval_with_sampling(expression='2 + 2 * 3'), server requests LLM sampling, client provides result, server returns 8
client1 connects to FileServer, lists resources with pagination (cursor-based), reads file:///test/static.txt
client1 connects to FileServer, reads resource via template file:///test/dynamic.txt, writes content, subscribes, modifies file, receives update notification
client1 connects to FileServer, gets prompt template 'summarize_file' with path='/test/static.txt', receives generated prompt
client1 connects to ErrorServer, calls always_error tool, receives tool execution error
client1 connects to ErrorServer, calls timeout tool, sends cancellation after 2 seconds, receives cancellation confirmation
client1 connects to CalcServer over stdio transport, performs initialization handshake with capability negotiation
client1 connects to CalcServer over streamable HTTP transport, performs initialization with session management
client1 connects to CalcServer, server sends progress notifications during long-running tool execution
client1 connects to CalcServer, requests tool list, server emits tools/list_changed notification, client re-requests list
client1 connects to FileServer, server emits resources/list_changed notification after file creation
client1 connects to CalcServer, calls add with invalid arguments, receives proper JSON-RPC error
client1 connects to CalcServer over SSE transport, maintains persistent connection for server-initiated requests
client1 connects to FileServer, server requests roots list from client, client provides filesystem roots
client1 connects with unsupported protocol version, receives version negotiation error
client1 connects to CalcServer, server sends logging messages at different levels during operation
client1 connects to CalcServer over streamable HTTP, connection drops and resumes with Last-Event-ID
client1 connects to CalcServer, calls ambiguous_add, user declines elicitation request, tool returns appropriate error
client1 connects to CalcServer, calls ambiguous_add, user cancels elicitation dialog, tool handles cancellation
